version_description:
- grenades
- level up rewards
- VIP ( x2 gold x2 exp )
- chevrons for levels
- bug fix

- New map: tdm_village
- Roket launchers
- Flamethrowers
- New weapons: RPG-7, FIM-92 Stinger, M202A1, M134 Minigun, Bushmaster ACR, Barrett M82, Striker, Remington 870, Firebug, Nightmare, Burning hell
- New armors: Older Armor, Champion's Armor
- Network improved

- Add new gadgets slot:
- installation of the turret
- mass treatment
- power board
- speed boots
- jet boots

- New weapon: M79 grenade launcher
- Pistols moved to additional weapons slot
- Any improvements & bug fix

- two new maps
- many new hats and skins
- waiting for players before the fight
- bug fixes

Version 1.5.0 complete:
- daily chests
- domination mode (new map)
- team battle royale mode (new map)
- fights 7 by 7
- interface improvements for group play
- rework armor
- new interface top100
- bug fix

- daily chests
- domination mode (new map)
- team battle royale mode (new map)
- fights 7 by 7
- interface improvements for group play
- rework armor
- new interface top100
- bug fix

- max player level up to 13
- now you can select 3 weapons presets and change it in battle
- new weapons: Healing Gun (7lvl), AK-ELM(13lvl)
- new armors for 13 lvl
- combo messages in battle
- redesign Helicopter map
- new hats
- now you run faster with pistols

- max level up to 20
- new weapons
- new hats
- new map
- new game balance
